title: Grilled Soft-shell Crab, Corn, And Asparagus With Arugula Pesto
summary: Grilled Soft-shell Crab, Corn, And Asparagus With Arugula Pesto might be just the main course you are searching for. For $6.98 per serving, this recipe covers 38% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe makes 4 servings with 1902 calories, 29g of protein, and 114g of fat each. 1 person were glad they tried this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 1 hour and 6 minutes. It will be a hit at your The Fourth Of July event. A mixture of soft-shell crabs, greens, kosher salt and pepper, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so yummy. To use up the pie shell you could follow this main course with the Sugar & Spice Pie Crust Cookies as a dessert. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 76%. This score is solid. Try Soft Shell Crab Pasta with Cilantro-Ginger Pesto, Grilled or Sauteed Soft Shell Crab BLT, and Grilled Soft-Shell Crab and Pineapple Salad with Watercress for similar recipes.
instructions: Blanch the asparagus in a large pot of boiling water and transfer to a bowl of ice water. Meanwhile, prepare the Arugula Pesto.

steps.step: Blanch the asparagus in a large pot of boiling water and transfer to a bowl of ice water. Meanwhile, prepare the Arugula Pesto.
